description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale is now live. The three-day shopping event includes hundreds of great deals on top smartphones, laptops, TVs, and other electronics. We’ve handpicked the best deals on gadgets you can grab on the first day of the sale.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale Goes Live: Best Offers on Smartphones, Electronics

description: Scientists have created a groundbreaking gelatin-based robotic skin capable of sensing touch, heat, and physical damage like cuts or burns. Developed by a team including Dr. Thomas George Thuruthel from University College London, the skin uses a single conductive layer embedded with electrodes to detect and classify stimuli. It was tested through pokes, burns, and slices, generating over a million data points processed by a machine-learning model. This low-cost, stretchable material simplifies traditional multi-sensor designs, offering a practical solution for enhancing prosthetic limbs and humanoid robots with lifelike sensitivity and responsiveness in real-world environments.
title: New Gel-Based Robotic Skin Feels Touch, Heat, and Damage Like Human Flesh

description: Scientists have successfully recreated Fermi acceleration in a lab using ultracold atoms and movable optical barriers, simulating how cosmic rays gain energy in space. Developed by teams from Birmingham and Chicago, the mini Fermi accelerator marks a major advance in particle physics, opening doors to high-energy astrophysics studies and innovations in quantum technology and atomtronics.
title: Scientists Recreate Cosmic Ray Physics Using Cold Atom in New Laboratory Study

description: Astronomers suggest that brown dwarfs—dim, failed stars—could transform into “dark dwarfs” by capturing dark matter in their cores. When dark matter particles annihilate, they release heat, potentially lighting up these stars. Physicist Jeremy Sakstein and researchers like Jillian Paulin and Rebecca Leane support this idea, which could help identify dark matter as heavy, self-annihilating particles. These objects may retain lithium-7, unlike typical brown dwarfs. Telescopes like NASA’s James Webb may already be capable of spotting such bodies near the Milky Way’s center, offering vital clues about the nature of dark matter.
title: Scientists Say Dark Matter Could Turn Failed Stars Into ‘Dark Dwarfs’

description: Flipkart GOAT Sale 2025 kicks off at midnight on Saturday, and will be open to all shoppers until July 14. Customers can snag discounts on smartphones, wireless accessories, tablets, laptops, and other electronics during Flipkart's sale. Here are some of the top deals on smartphones from brands like Apple, Samsung, Motorola, and Nothing during the upcoming sale.
title: Flipkart GOAT Sale 2025 Begins on July 12 for All Customers Alongside Amazon Prime Day Sale

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is tipped to come with a 1/1.1-inch 200-megapixel Sony CMOS sensor. This would be a notable upgrade over the 1/1.3-inch sensor found in the Galaxy S25 Ultra. The existing Galaxy S series phones have Sony sensors.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Tipped to Get 200-Megapixel Sony Camera Sensor

description: The Acer Aspire Go 14, priced from Rs. 59,999 in India, features a 14-inch WUXGA IPS display and is powered by up to an Intel Core Ultra 7 CPU with Intel Arc Graphics. It supports up to 32GB of DDR5 RAM and up to 1TB of SSD storage. The laptop comes with Intel AI Boost, a Copilot key, an HD webcam with privacy shutter, and a 55Wh battery with 65W USB-C charging. It weighs 1.5kg and supports Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, and multiple USB port connectivity.
title: Acer Aspire Go 14 Launched in India With Up to Intel Core Ultra 7 CPU: Price, Features

description: Flipkart Goat Sale will kick off on July 12. Ahead of the sale, Carl Pei-led Nothing announced that several of its smartphones, audio and other wearable products will be available to buyers at discounted rates during the Flipkart sale. The sale will bring discounts on CMF products as well.
title: Flipkart GOAT Sale: Nothing Phone 3a, Phone 3a Pro, CMF Phone 2 Pro, More to See Discounts

description: Hollywood video game voice and motion capture actors signed a new contract with video game studios on Wednesday with a focus on artificial intelligence protections, the actors' union, SAG-AFTRA, said in a press release, ending a near year-long strike.
title: Industry Video Game Actors Pass Agreement With Studios for AI Security

description: Shares of Nvidia ended up 0.75 percent at $164.10, giving it a market value of $4.004 trillion and extending its lead over Apple and Microsoft as it benefits from a surge in demand for artificial-intelligence technologies.
title: Nvidia's Market Value Tops $4 Trillion

description: Samsung Days sale 2025, the company’s India-focused sale, will kick off starting Saturday, July 12. The six-day-long sale event will exclusively take place on Samsung’s website, its Shop app, and offline Experience stores, and conclude on July 18. The South Korean tech giant stated that the focus this year is on its AI-powered devices across categories.
title: Samsung Days Sale 2025 Offers Up to 41 Percent Discount on Galaxy S25 Ultra, S25 Edge

description: Zee5 is about to step into the Free Ad-Supported Streaming Television (FAST) channels service in collaboration with Amagi Media Labs. The company has announced that it will launch the FAST channels in India in August 2025. According to Statista, the FAST channels market revenue in India is projected to reach $194.71 million (about Rs. 1,671 crore) in 2025.
title: Zee5 Partners With Amagi; to Launch Free Ad-Supported Streaming TV Channels In August In India

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale starts in a few hours, but shoppers can already access Prime Day Early Deals to secure discounts on smartwatches and other consumer electronics devices from brands like Apple, Huawei, OnePlus, and others, before the July 12 sale. Customers can also maximise savings through eligible bank card discounts. Access to all Prime Day offers requires an active Amazon Prime subscription, which allows you to save even more on your purchases.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Apple Watch Series 9, Huawei Watch GT 5 Prices Drop With Prime Day Early Deals

description: Smart TVs from brands like Samsung, Sony, Xiaomi, and LG are now available at reduced prices as part of the Amazon Prime Day Early Deals. Shoppers can avail of instant discounts on select bank cards. There are exchange offers and coupon offers.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Top Early Deals on 55-Inch Smart TVs

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 sale in India begins tomorrow. It is a three-day affair, taking place between July 12-14. Lumio, the home-grown consumer technology startup founded by Flipkart and Xiaomi veterans has announced offers on its new range of Vision TVs and Arc-series projectors. Buyers can enjoy discounts, exchange benefits, and bank offers.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025: Best Deals on Lumio Vision TVs, Arc 7 Projector

description: Amazon Prime Day sale 2025, which will begin on July 12, is still a day away. However, if you’re in immediate need, the e-commerce giant is currently offering a large range of products with discounts, as part of its “Prime Day early deals” event. These early deals began on Thursday and will continue till Friday midnight, when the Prime Day sale officially begins.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025: Best Early Deals on Gaming Laptops

description: The Boat Valour Watch 1 GPS is priced from Rs. 5,999 in India and is sold in silicone and nylon strap options. It features a 1.43-inch AMOLED display, built-in GPS, and AI-backed workout recognition. It supports Bluetooth calling, real-time fitness tracking, and swim analytics. The smartwatch is powered by an X2 chipset, and with a 300mAh battery, it is said to offer up to 15 days of battery life.
title: Boat Valour Watch 1 GPS Launched in India With Up to 15 Days of Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Sony has revealed two new limited-edition Ghost of Yotei PS5 console bundles along with new accessories. The new PS5 consoles and DualSense controllers feature designs inspired by traditional Japanese art.
title: Sony Announces Limited-Edition Ghost of Yotei PS5 Bundles, Accessories

description: Xiaomi launched its X Pro QLED 2025 TV lineup in India this April, offering premium features like a QLED panel, 4K resolution, and Filmmaker Mode. Available in 43-inch, 55-inch, and 65-inch sizes, the TVs are competitively priced, especially when compared to rivals offering similar specs at much higher costs. But does that make them a worthy alternative to more expensive options? We break it down in our full review.
title: Xiaomi X Pro QLED TV Review: The Price is Right

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 will run from July 12 to 14, marking its longest Prime Day sale yet. Shoppers will enjoy discounts across categories, including smart TVs, laptops, smartphones, and TWS earphones. Early deals include the OnePlus Buds 4 at under Rs. 5,999 and JBL Tune Beam 2 below Rs. 5,499 with bank offers and coupon discounts. Additional benefits like no-cost EMI options and exchange offers are available. SBI and ICICI Bank cardholders can get an extra 10 percent discount during the sale.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025: Best Early Deals Currently Live on TWS Earphones

description: Apple researchers, in collaboration with the University of Southern California, have developed a new artificial intelligence (AI) model that tracks behavioural data over sensor signals. The new research builds on prior work by the Apple Heart and Movement Study (AHMS) and was aimed at understanding whether behavioural data can be a better determinant of a person’s health compared to traditional indices.
title: Apple Researchers Create an AI Model That Uses Behavioural Data from Wearables to Predict Health Signals

description: The HP EliteBook 8 G1i has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop packs a 14-inch 2.8K IPS touch display that offers decent colours. It also features a powerful Intel Core Ultra 7 processor that can handle most of the daily tasks. Check out the review to learn more about the latest Lenovo laptop.
title: HP EliteBook 8 G1i Review: A Sleek and Premium Business Laptop

description: Oppo, the Chinese smartphone manufacturer, has confirmed that its new K13 Turbo series handsets are going to launch on July 21 in China. The company made the announcement via a social media post. Along with the confirmation, it also posted a promotional video that shows one of the handsets with a cooling fan placed under the primary camera to manage thermals.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo Series With RGB Lighting and Fan Confirmed to Launch In China On July 21

description: Razer DeathAdder V4 Pro was launched in India on Friday. The latest gaming mouse is said to be engineered for e-sports professionals and competitive play. It is equipped with Razer HyperSpeed Wireless Gen-2 technology which delivers more than 63 percent higher power efficiency along with lower latency than its predecessor. The Razer DeathAdder V4 Pro has an Optical Scroll Wheel for better tactile control.
title: Razer DeathAdder V4 Pro Gaming Mouse With Optical Scroll Wheel Launched in India

description: According to a report by Counterpoint Research, global smartwatch shipments fell 2 percent YoY in Q1 2025, marking the fifth straight quarterly decline, driven by slowing demand in India and reduced Apple shipments. China's smartwatch shipments, led by Huawei, Imoo, and Xiaomi, grew 37 percent YoY. Despite a continued decline, Apple held the top spot, while Samsung saw an 18 percent drop. Imoo led the growing kids’ smartwatch segment.
title: Global Smartwatch Shipments Dip 2 Percent YoY in Q1 2025, While China Sees Growth: Counterpoint

description: Samsung’s Galaxy S Plus models have always been an afterthought for the company for many years, offering the same specifications as the base S series model with a larger display and a bigger battery at a much higher price. Things changed a bit this year, when Samsung decided to show it some love with a higher-resolution display. However, it now seems that the upcoming Galaxy S26 Plus may get the axe.
title: Samsung's Galaxy S26 Lineup May Skip the Plus Model in Favour of Edge Model

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) has rolled out 5G services in Mysuru, following its Bengaluru launch last month. Mysuru subscribers with 5G smartphones can now access unlimited 5G data as part of an introductory offer. Vi partnered with Samsung for the deployment and confirmed it is working to enhance network coverage by deploying additional spectrum across various cities in the country.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) 5G Services Rolled Out in Mysuru, Subscribers to Get Unlimited 5G Data on Some Plans

description: Xiaomi has reportedly started to roll out stable the HyperOS 2.2 update to the 14 Ultra in India. The update reportedly bears firmware version OS2.0.201.0.VNAINXM and brings the June Android security patch to the Xiaomi 14 Ultra. It is said to offer improvements and fixes for several known bugs.
title: Xiaomi 14 Ultra Receiving Stable HyperOS 2.2 Update in India: Report

description: Amazon Web Services (AWS), the cloud computing platform of the tech giant, is reportedly planning to launch a marketplace for artificial intelligence (AI) agents. As per the report, the company could launch the marketplace next week at its AWS Summit event in New York, which will be held on July 15.
title: Amazon Web Services (AWS) Reportedly Launching a Marketplace for AI Agents

description: Sucker Punch detailed the exploration, combat and new game modes in their upcoming action-adventure title, Ghost of Yotei, at a State of Play livestream on Thursday. The developer showed off new weapons, a new clues-based exploration system and more.
title: Ghost of Yotei Gameplay Deep Dive Reveals Clues-Based Exploration, Combat a New Game Modes

description: Realme Note 70T has been spotted on a Lithuanian retailer’s website with key specifications and design ahead of its official launch. The listing suggests that the rumoured smartphone could feature a Unisoc T7250 SoC paired with 4GB RAM and 128GB internal storage.
title: Realme Note 70T Listing On Retailer Website Suggests Key Specifications and Design

description: Tesla is set to enter India’s electric vehicle (EV) market with its first showroom opening in Mumbai this month, according to a report. In recent years, the Elon Musk-owned company faced several hurdles, including regulations and high import taxes, which raised question marks over its arrival in the country. However, its long-awaited foray is finally on the verge of happening, with the first Tesla Experience Centre reportedly set to be inaugurated in Mumbai’s Bandra Kurla Complex (BKC).
title: Tesla to Begin India Operations With Experience Centre Opening in Mumbai’s BKC on July 15: Report

description: Xiaomi 15T Pro allegedly appeared on the FCC database. The listing suggests 5G, Bluetooth, NFC and Wi-Fi 7 connectivity options on the phone. It could ship with the HyperOS 2.0 interface. The Xiaomi 15T Pro is likely to pack 12GB RAM and up to 1TB storage.
title: Xiaomi 15T Pro Allegedly Spotted on FCC Database; RAM and Storage Details Tipped

description: YouTube recently announced that it will be revising its monetisation policy to curb mass-produced and inauthentic videos on its platform. Now, the video streaming platform has announced that it will be removing its Trending Page in the next couple of weeks.
title: YouTube Trending Page To Shut Down On July 21, 10 Years After Its Launch

description: Google is introducing a new Android Canary release channel to replace its Android Developer Previews. The new Android Canary channel offers continuous, rolling releases of Android with features that are still in development. While Canary provides the latest functionality, Google confirmed it will maintain the existing beta programme. This beta channel will offer a more polished, stable experience alongside the constantly updating Canary releases.
title: Android Canary Channel With Rolling Releases to Replace Google's Developer Previews

description: Google is now improving the functionality of its Veo 3 video generation model with the inclusion of image-to-video generation. On Thursday, the Mountain View-based tech giant announced that eligible users will now be able to add images as input and generate videos based on them using Veo 3. Notably, this feature is currently available via Gemini’s web interface, and the mobile apps do not support it.
title: Google’s Veo 3 in Gemini Upgraded With Image to Video Generation Capability

description: The Infinix Hot 60 5G+ features a 6.7-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a MediaTek Dimensity 7020 SoC with 6GB LPDDR5x RAM. It includes a customisable AI button and supports AI tools like Folax, Circle to Search, Call Assistant and Writing Assistant. It is said to offer up to 90fps gaming. The handset also supports dual-mode video recording and Ultralink "no-network" voice calling.  The phone packs a 5,200mAh battery and supports bypass as well as reverse wired charging technologies.
title: Infinix Hot 60 5G+ Launched in India With Custom AI Button, MediaTek Dimensity 7020 SoC

description: Microsoft has begun rolling out the new Black Screen of Death (BSOD) with the latest update in the Release Preview Channel for Windows 11 Insiders. It replaces the infamous Blue Screen of Death that users have faced in times of a critical error in the operating system. The update also has several new features in such as Draft with Copilot in Word, Quick machine recovery for detecting and fixing issues, and a Click-to-Do action dubbed Practice in Reading Coach.
title: Microsoft Rolls Out Black Screen of Death, More Features to Windows 11 Insiders in Release Preview Channel

description: The Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold has appeared on Geekbench suggesting that the handset may feature a Tensor G5 chipset paired with 16GB of RAM. It is expected to ship with Android 16. Previous leaks hint that the phone could come in 256GB, 512GB and 1TB storage options. It will likely get a 6.4-inch cover display, a thinner hinge, and an IP68-rated dust and water-resistant build.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Listed on Geekbench With 16GB RAM, Octa-Core SoC and Android 16

description: Alleged hands-on images of the dummy unit for the iPhone 17 Air have leaked on the Web. The leak offers a detailed look at the rear design of the handset. It has a rectangular rear camera module, covering the width of the rear panel, housing three sensors. The LED flash and LiDAR sensor are seen on the right side with the new camera housing.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Alleged Hands-on Images Offer Closer Look at the New Rear Camera Design

description: Ray-Ban Meta Glasses were released in 2023 in the US, while they were only recently introduced in other markets such as India. However, the successor to the smart glasses may not be too far away. According to a report, alleged renders of the Ray-Ban Meta Glasses successor have surfaced which showcase two separate designs for sunglasses and prescription glasses. The glasses are reported to come with improved battery life and enhanced artificial intelligence (AI) features.
title: Ray-Ban Meta Glasses Successor’s Design Leaked via Alleged Renders; Launch Slated for This Year

description: Apple is said to have stacked its schedule for 2026 with a plethora of launches. As per a seasoned journalist, the Cupertino-based tech giant may introduce an M5-powered MacBook Pro, M4-powered iPad Air, an entry-level iPad, and a new MacBook Air in the first half of the next year. Further, it is also reported to be developing the successor to the iPhone 16e — the iPhone 17e — which could carry a similar design as the current model.
title: Apple Reportedly Plans to Launch iPhone 17e, M5 MacBook Pro, and More Devices in 2026
